Title: Survival Ring: Flame
Description:
This is one of the challenges I put upon my warriors to keep them strong and fast. Let's see how you fare.

Survive the ring for 60 seconds without getting pushed out or killed. Stay on your toes.
ObjectivesText: Enter the Survival Ring and survive for 60 seconds without leaving.

Objectives.Text: Live through the Survival Ring for 60 seconds
